entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 50 km/h diminishing to 20 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
